SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeartBeatListener, VirtualView, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientRMI, ClientSocket
public abstract class Client extends Object implements VirtualView
The Client class represents the endpoint of a connection with the server. It provides methods to update the model representation on the client side as well as their view.

  • Method Details

    • bindServer

      public abstract VirtualServer bindServer(String ip, Integer port) throws UnReachableServerException
      Connects the client to the ip and port provided.
      Parameters:
      ip - the ip address.
      port - the port number.
      Throws:
      UnReachableServerException - if the server isn't reachable.

    • getInstanceForTheServer

      public abstract VirtualView getInstanceForTheServer() throws RemoteException
      Returns the instance of the client for the server to communicate updates.
      Returns:
      a VirtualView representing the client reference for the server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if it's impossible to obtain the reference for the server because of network problems.

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Returns the state of the connection between the client and the server
      Returns:
      true if this client is connected to the server; false otherwise.

    • configure

      public void configure(ClientController controller, View view)
      Adds the controller and the view for the client
      Parameters:
      controller - to communicate modifications of the game.
      view - to show updates to the screen.

    • showUpdateColor

      public void showUpdateColor(PlayerColor color, String username) throws RemoteException

      Specified by:

    • showUpdateAfterPlace

      public void showUpdateAfterPlace(Map<Position,CornerPosition> positionToCornerCovered, List<Position> newAvailablePositions, Map<Symbol,Integer> newResources, int points, String username, ClientCard placedCard, Side placedSide, Position position) throws RemoteException
      Method used to show updated information after a place. The two list positions and tiles represent every new available tile added after the last place invocation symbols and total amount represents the new resources added after the last place invocation consider both couples like maps.
      Specified by:
      showUpdateAfterPlace in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      positionToCornerCovered - a map with the covered corners.
      newAvailablePositions - a list with every new available tile added after the last placement.
      newResources - the new resources added after the last placement.
      points - the points present after the placement.
      username - the username of the player.
      placedCard - the card that has been placed.
      placedSide - the side of the card that has been placed.
      position - the position of the card in the playground.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.

    • showUpdateAfterDraw

      public void showUpdateAfterDraw(ClientCard drawnCard, ClientFace newTopDeck, ClientCard newFaceUpCard, String username, int boardPosition) throws RemoteException
      Method used to notify the update after a draw.
      Specified by:
      showUpdateAfterDraw in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      drawnCard - the drawn card.
      newTopDeck - the new card that replaces the previous card that was present in the deck.
      newFaceUpCard - the new face up card that replaces the previous one.
      username - the username of the player who performs the drawing.
      boardPosition - from which the card was selected, 4 for golden deck, 5 for resource deck and 0,1,2 or 3 for face up cards.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.
